Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.util

Class ML

java.lang.Object
com.github.oeuvres.alix.util.ML
public class ML extends Object
Some useful tools to deal with “Markup Languages” (xml, but also html tag soup)

    • forChar

      public static char forChar(String ent)
      Get the char from an HTML entity like &gt; or &#128;. Will not work on supplementary char like &Afr; 𝔄 &x1d504; (3 bytes).
      Parameters:
      ent -
      Returns:

    • detag

      public static void detag(String xml, int begin, int end, Chain dest, Set<String> include)
      Return a normalize-space() text version of an xml excerpt (possibly with broken tags). Chain could be reused here for performances.
